description:
Momoka is desperate to win the seat next to Fuyuki when the class shuffles seats around.  Later, an alien discovers that nothing can erase 556`s feelings for his sister... or his beloved storage units!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoka, The Big Seat Change Plan / Kogoro, My Feelings!
桃華 席替え大作戦 であります / 556 オレの想い! であります
